DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to continue follow up of conservatively treated CHI patients and to focus on their metabolic outcome, including frequency of hypoglycemia after discontinuing treatment and incidence of diabetes mellitus in the long term.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Glucose Metabolism in Conservatively Treated Patients With Congenital Hyperinsulinism
DOC.criteria: conservatively treated CHI patients who are in remission for at least one year
